name: xml_normalize
description: Normalizes xml files. Options include sorting siblings, remove nodes, whitespace normalization and pretty print.

scripts.run-examples: tsc && node dist/index.js -i examples/messages.xlf -o examples/messages2.xlf -s xliff.file[0].unit.id -r xliff.file[].unit[].notes -n
scripts.run-examples2: tsc && node dist/index.js -i examples/messages.xlf -o examples/messages2.xlf -s note.somenotes.anote.id -r note.somenotes.anote[].dummy -d -n

author: daniel-schreiber@gmx.de
